text: @JJohnymac @NewType36999768 @davidkurten Problem is it's not just 5g that goes when an entire mast gets burned it all goes including the tech that emergency services do depend on and I understand concerns that's why I try and answer as many questions as I can but I don't think the solution to any problem is arson
